name: 900feet
overview:
900feet is a location-based mobile data management, analytics and contextualization platform that tracks WHERE mobile activity occurs, and all the ambient mobile activity around each place.

On top of all the location activity data is a tablet-friendly web based client, that looks and feels like an interactive web magazine. This oﬀers an interactive way to share and contextualize vast amounts of social activity and data in a familiar, intuitive and digestible package; one that answers where activities happen.
